item.title: Avoid Bicycle Thefts in Toronto Using Historical Data
item.description: Abstract Toronto bicycle route infrastructure is quickly growing, but the city suffers from large cases of bicycle thefts. After making observations on historical bicycle data, we have observed that bicycle theft is very common in Toronto.
